StudentClassroomScreen - client中的类
The StudentClassroomScreen class allows a student to view their past assignments and an option to create a new submission.
StudentClassroomScreen(Classroom, String, Student) - 类 的构造器client.StudentClassroomScreen
Shows past submissions of the student and allows user to submit new assignments.
StudentScreen - client中的类
The screen for the students.

Sets up the submission screen as a JPanel.
Submission - data中的类
The Submission class models a submission that a student makes to the teacher.
Submission() - 类 的构造器data.Submission
No args constructor, will initialize the name and content to an empty string.

Creates a new submission object.
Submission(String, String, String, int) - 类 的构造器data.Submission
For initializing a submission with a grade already set
SubmissionScreen - client中的类
